FuncDef: The display snmp-agent proxy target-host command displays target host information on an SNMP proxy. The display snmp-agent proxy target-host command displays target host information on an SNMP proxy.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies a target host name.
The value is a string of 1 to 32 case-sensitive characters, spaces not supported.
When quotation marks are used around the string, spaces are allowed in the string.

ExtraInfo: To view default or configured target host information on an SNMP proxy, run the display snmp-agent proxy target-host command.
